name: Simple Snake Feeder
description:
Made for Trijam #154
theme: There is a twist

As for the theme. The "twist" is that you don't control the snake as you would normally do. Instead you guide it by placing food and it will then move to the closest one and eat it :) Unfortunately I ran out of time, and all you can do is feed the snake and chill :)

Made in 3 hours (with seconds to spare :D)
To make a game in 3 hours was daunting, but I had a clear view of what I wanted to do, and how to do it, which made it easier :). I only wish I had the time to actually make a game out of it, with goals and challenges...

Controls:
  • Left click / touch to feed the snake
  • Press 'R' to restart
Tools and assets used
  • Unity
    • DooTween
    • SmartLighting2D
  • 1BitDragon 
  • Inkscape
